name: AccessibilitySystemRotor
desc: Designates a Rotor that replaces one of the automatic, system-provided Rotors with a developer-provided Rotor.

items.name: static var boldText: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all the ranges of bolded text.

items.name: static var headings: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all headings.

items.name: static var images: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all images.

items.name: static var italicText: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all the ranges of italicized text.

items.name: static var landmarks: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all landmarks.

items.name: static var links: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all links.

items.name: static var lists: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all lists.

items.name: static var misspelledWords: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all the ranges of mis-spelled words.

items.name: static var tables: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all tables.

items.name: static var textFields: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all text fields.

items.name: static var underlineText: AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotor allowing users to iterate through all the ranges of underlined text.

items.name: static func headings(level: AccessibilityHeadingLevel) -> AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotors allowing users to iterate through all headings, of various heading levels.

items.name: static func links(visited: Bool) -> AccessibilitySystemRotor
items.desc: System Rotors allowing users to iterate through links or visited links.
